title: Zero-Trust Architecture
excerpt: Zero-trust architecture treats every access request as untrusted...

title: How I Debug Like a Psychopath
excerpt: Step 1: Panic. Step 2: Add print statements...
content: Step 3: Sacrifice a rubber duck. Step 4: It magically works and I forget to commit for 6 hours. Typical debugging workflow, right?
